answers.answer: I already have sever diabeties before i got pregnant so just Try to eat really healthy & Try to avoid alot of sugary foods, Try to get some exersize & drink as much water as possible! You may have to monitor your blood sugar & prick your finger if your doctor wants you to... Your baby should be healthy If you watch it closly... even tho you may have à big baby because it can cause that
my baby so far shows its at a normal weight and size..

I just got the test done for it and results were little high so I may have it. But like I know u have to eat healthy but is it ok to go out to eat every now and then and can u still drink pop? I get migraines if I don't have pop everyday!

I got diagnosed at 28 weeks with GD. My doctor had me see a dietician and get a monitor to check my blood sugar 4x daily! Normally with gestational diabetes they induce you at 39 weeks but my baby is completely healthy and my blood sugars are normal so I'm being induced at 40 weeks if she hasn't came out yet.
Yes you can still eat sweets n drink pop every now n then Jus dont over do it.
